page.title: 06Badlesmere : People
page.content: The 5th Earl Sondes lives at Stringman Farm and is concerned with preserving the rural character of his estate much of which is An Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. The Estate runs the local pheasant shoot. No exact data is available (fear of disruption by Animal Rights Groups is given as reason for non disclosure of facts) but is is estimated that some lO-l4,OOO birds are raised annually and the cost of a daily gun is approx. Â£l5OO, for mainly Americans and other overseas visitors. Cheryl Fountain, daughter of the Sondes Estate Gamekeeper, is a notable artist living in Lords Cottages. She exhibits regularly at the Royal Academy.
